mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_NM, BIZ_DCD, RQST_STEP_CD, RQST_RESN, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert:
/* WaqMstrMapper.insert */
insert into WAQ_MSTR (RQST_NO, RQST_NM, BIZ_DCD, RQST_STEP_CD, RQST_RESN, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstStepCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* WaqMstrMapper.insertSelective */
insert into WAQ_MSTR
RQST_NO,
RQST_NM,
BIZ_DCD,
RQST_STEP_CD,
RQST_RESN,
WRIT_DTM,
WRIT_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{rqstStepCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
/* WaqMstrMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */
update WAQ_MSTR
RQST_NM = #{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIZ_DCD = #{bizDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_STEP_CD = #{rqstStepCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_RESN = #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* WaqMstrMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */
update WAQ_MSTR set RQST_NM = #{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZ_DCD = #{bizDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_STEP_CD = #{rqstStepCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_RESN = #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* WaqMstrMapper.updateWaqMstrqstNmDtt2 */
-- 요청서명 업데이트 (DDL 이관요청 일경우...) UPDATE WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM1) IS NOT NULL OR MAX(RQST_NM2) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('DDL이관 ' , IFNULL(CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM1) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('[', MAX(RQST_NM1), ']') END,'') , IFNULL(CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM2) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('[', MAX(RQST_NM2), ']') END,'') ,'[총 건수: ', SUM(CNT) , ']') END AS RQST_NM ,#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS RQST_NO FROM ( SELECT (CONCAT(IFNULL(B.BIZ_NM,''), ': ',IFNULL(A.DDL_TBL_PNM,''), CASE WHEN B.CNT > 1 THEN CONCAT(' 외 ', (B.CNT-1) , '건') ELSE '' END)) AS RQST_NM1 , null AS RQST_NM2 , null AS RQST_NM3 , CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL A JOIN ( SELECT 'DDL테이블' AS BIZ_NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MIN(RQST_NO) AS RQST_NO, MIN(RQST_SNO) AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VRF_CD = '1' ) B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO UNION ALL SELECT null AS RQST_NM1 ,(CONCAT(IFNULL(B.BIZ_NM,''), ': ',IFNULL(A.DDL_IDX_PNM,''), CASE WHEN B.CNT > 1 THEN CONCAT(' 외 ', (B.CNT-1) , '건') ELSE '' END)) AS RQST_NM2 , null AS RQST_NM3 , CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX A JOIN ( SELECT 'DDL인덱스' AS BIZ_NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MIN(RQST_NO) AS RQST_NO, MIN(RQST_SNO) AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VRF_CD = '1' ) B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO )AA )B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO SET A.RQST_NM = B.RQST_NM WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* WaqMstrMapper.updateWaqMstrqstNmDtt3 */
-- 요청서명 업데이트 (DDL 이관요청 일경우...) UPDATE WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM1) IS NOT NULL OR MAX(RQST_NM2) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('DDL이관 ' , IFNULL(CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM1) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('[', MAX(RQST_NM1), ']') END,'') , IFNULL(CASE WHEN MAX(RQST_NM2) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('[', MAX(RQST_NM2), ']') END,'') ,'[총 건수: ', SUM(CNT) , ']') END AS RQST_NM ,#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS RQST_NO FROM ( SELECT (CONCAT(IFNULL(B.BIZ_NM,''), ': ',IFNULL(A.DDL_TBL_PNM,''), CASE WHEN B.CNT > 1 THEN CONCAT(' 외 ', (B.CNT-1) , '건') ELSE '' END)) AS RQST_NM1 , null AS RQST_NM2 , null AS RQST_NM3 , CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL A JOIN ( SELECT 'DDL테이블' AS BIZ_NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MIN(RQST_NO) AS RQST_NO, MIN(RQST_SNO) AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND VRF_CD = '1' ) B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO UNION ALL SELECT null AS RQST_NM1 ,(CONCAT(IFNULL(B.BIZ_NM,''), ': ',IFNULL(A.DDL_IDX_PNM,''), CASE WHEN B.CNT > 1 THEN CONCAT(' 외 ', (B.CNT-1) , '건') ELSE '' END)) AS RQST_NM2 , null AS RQST_NM3 , CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A JOIN ( SELECT 'DDL인덱스' AS BIZ_NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MIN(RQST_NO) AS RQST_NO, MIN(RQST_SNO) AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND VRF_CD = '1' ) B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO )AA )B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO SET A.RQST_NM = B.RQST_NM WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
/* WaqMstrMapper.selectrvwStatus */
SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(APPR_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '2' WHEN IFNULL(SUM(REJ_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS APPR_RET FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' ) X
SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(APPR_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '2' WHEN IFNULL(SUM(REJ_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS APPR_RET FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' )
SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(APPR_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS APPR_RET FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS APPR_CNT FROM WAQ_APP_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS APPR_CNT FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' )
SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(B.APPR_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '2' WHEN IFNULL(SUM(B.REJ_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS APPR_RET FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM ${tblnm} WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' )B

/* WaqMstrMapper.selectrvwStatusTsf */
SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(B.APPR_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '2' WHEN IFNULL(SUM(B.REJ_CNT), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS APPR_RET FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM ${tblnm} WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS APPR_CNT, CASE WHEN RVW_STS_CD ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REJ_CNT FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' )B

/* WaqMstrMapper.selectRqstMyList */ SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.BIZ_DCD , A.RQST_NM , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_STEP_CD , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_USER_NM , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_STATUS , CASE WHEN APRV_STEP_LVL_TEMP IS NULL THEN '' WHEN APRV_STEP_LVL_TEMP IS NOT NULL AND APR_LVL IS NULL THEN CONCAT(IFNULL(APRV_STEP_LVL_TEMP, '') , '(결재단계 없음)') ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL(APR_LVL, '') , ' / ' , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO), '') , '단계 (' , IFNULL(APRV_STEP_LVL_TEMP, '') , ')') END AS APRV_STEP_LVL , CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor
FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.BIZ_DCD, A.RQST_NM, A.RQST_DTM, GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM, -- U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM, A.RQST_STEP_CD, A.RQST_USER_ID, B.APR_LVL, B.USER_ID, B.APRV_DTM, B.APR_FRML_CD, A.WRIT_USER_ID, B.RVW_STS_CD, CASE WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '3' THEN '부분승인' WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '반려' WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' THEN '승인' WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.RVW_STS_CD IS NULL THEN '자동승인' END AS APRV_STATUS,
CASE WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' THEN '결재 완료'
WHEN B.APR_FRML_CD = 'G' THEN CONCAT(IFNULL(( SELECT APRG_NM FROM WAA_APRG WHERE APRG_ID = B.USER_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')), '') , '그룹') WHEN B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' THEN CONCAT(IFNULL((SELECT GET_USER_NM(B.USER_ID) FROM DUAL), '') , '님') END AS APRV_STEP_LVL_TEMP, CASE -- 결재내역중 가장 마지막 결재건, 전결된 내역, 미결재내역중 현재 결재대상건 확인 WHEN (RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NOT NULL) OR RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.APR_LVL IS NULL OR RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL)) OR RQST_STEP_CD = 'S' THEN '1'
ELSE '0' END AS CHECK_APR_LVL
FROM WAQ_MSTR A LEFT JOIN WAA_APR_PRC B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO ) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CHECK_APR_LVL = '1' AND A.RQST_NM IS NOT NULL
AND A.RQST_NO LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND A.BIZ_DCD = #{bizDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.RQST_NO IN (SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_STWD WHERE ( UPPER(STWD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(STWD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE ( UPPER(DMN_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(DMN_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_SDITM WHERE ( UPPER(SDITM_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(SDITM_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL WHERE ( UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL WHERE ( UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX WHERE ( UPPER(DDL_IDX_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR UPPER(DDL_IDX_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) UNION ALL SELECT RQST_NO FROM WAQ_MSTR WHERE UPPER(RQST_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') )
AND UPPER(A.RQST_USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{rqstUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND A.RQST_STEP_CD = #{rqstStepCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.RQST_NO IN (SELECT X.RQST_NO FROM WAA_APR_PRC X WHERE GET_USER_NM(X.USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{aprvUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
AND A.APRV_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{aprvStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND A.RQST_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{searchBgnDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.RQST_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchEndDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d') , INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND A.APRV_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{searchBgnDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.APRV_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchEndDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d') , INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY RQST_DTM DESC, RQST_STEP_CD, RQST_NO, APR_LVL

/* WaqMstrMapper.selectRqstToDoList */
SELECT A.* , CASE WHEN A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' THEN '#0000FF' END AS FontColor FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.BIZ_DCD , A.RQST_NM , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_STEP_CD , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , B.APR_LVL , B.USER_ID , B.APRV_DTM , B.APR_FRML_CD , CONCAT(IFNULL(APR_LVL, '') , ' / ' , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO), '') , '단계') AS APRV_STEP_LVL , CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' -- 개인 결재 결재자ID 본인 건 AND B.USER_ID = #{rqstUserId} -- 결재자ID AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' -- 개인 결재 결재자ID 본인 AND B.USER_ID = #{rqstUserId} AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NOT NULL) THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'G' AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT APRG_ID FROM WAA_APRG_USER WHERE APRG_ID = B.APRG_ID AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND USER_ID = #{rqstUserId}) AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'G' AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT APRG_ID FROM WAA_APRG_USER WHERE APRG_ID = B.APRG_ID AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND USER_ID = #{rqstUserId}) AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NOT NULL) THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.USER_ID != #{rqstUserId} AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM WAA_RQST_APRP WHERE 1=1 AND ABD_DAPR_DCD = 'D' AND SBS_APRP_ID = #{rqstUserId} AND DAPR_STR_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND DAPR_END_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.USER_ID != #{rqstUserId} AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM WAA_RQST_APRP WHERE 1=1 AND ABD_DAPR_DCD = 'D' AND SBS_APRP_ID = #{rqstUserId} AND DAPR_STR_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND DAPR_END_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NOT NULL) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END END END END END END AS CHECK_APR_LVL
FROM WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_APR_PRC B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO ) A
AND (A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.APRV_DTM IS NULL OR A.RQST_STEP_CD = 'A' AND A.APRV_DTM IS NOT NULL) AND A.CHECK_APR_LVL = '1'
AND BIZ_DCD = #{bizDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND RQST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{rqstNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(RQST_DTM, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchBgnDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(RQST_DTM, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY RQST_DTM DESC, RQST_NO, APR_LVL

/* WaqMstrMapper.selectRqstToDoListForMain */
SELECT A.* ,(SELECT B.COMM_DTL_CD_NM FROM WAA_COMM_DCD A INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.COMM_DCD = 'BIZ_DCD' AND B.COMM_DTL_CD = A.BIZ_DCD) AS BIZ_DCD_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_NO ,A.BIZ_DCD ,A.RQST_NM ,A.RQST_DTM ,A.RQST_STEP_CD ,GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM ,B.APR_LVL ,B.USER_ID ,B.APRV_DTM ,GET_CMCD_NM(A.BIZ_DCD) AS BIZ_DCD_NM_NOUSE ,B.APR_FRML_CD -- 그룹결재인지 개인결재인지 ,CASE WHEN RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.USER_ID = #{rqstUserId} -- 실 로그인아이디 AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) -- 결재대상자가 나인 경우 OR RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'G'
AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT APRG_ID FROM WAA_APRG_USER WHERE APRG_ID = B.APRG_ID AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND USER_ID = #{rqstUserId}) -- 결재그룹이 내가 속한 그룹인 경우, 실 로그인아이디 AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL)
OR RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' AND B.USER_ID != 'meta' AND B.USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM WAA_RQST_APRP WHERE 1=1 AND ABD_DAPR_DCD = 'D' AND SBS_APRP_ID = #{rqstUserId} AND DAPR_STR_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') -- 마리아DB는 날짜타입과 날짜형식 문자열과 비교 가능 AND DAPR_END_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') -- 대신결재(대결)자에 이름이 있는 경우. ) AND B.APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL)
THEN '1'
ELSE '0' END AS CHECK_APR_LVL ,CONCAT(APR_LVL , ' / ' , (SELECT MAX(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO) , '단계') AS APRV_STEP_LVL FROM WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_APR_PRC B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO ) TMP
CHECK_APR_LVL = '1' AND RQST_NM IS NOT NULL
) A ORDER BY RQST_DTM DESC, RQST_NO, APR_LVL LIMIT 0,5

/* WaqMstrMapper.selectEaiGwSend */ -- ER-Accelerator 메타연계기능 관련 SELECT RQST_USER_ID AS SEND_ID ,RQST_USER_NM AS SEND_NAME ,APRV_USER_ID AS RECV_IDS ,'메타시스템 결재요청' AS SUBJECT ,CONCAT('메타시스템에 결재요청이 있습니다.

요청서명 : ',IFNULL(RQST_NM, ''),'
요청번호 : ',IFNULL(RQST_NO, ''),'
요청자 : ',IFNULL(RQST_USER_NM, '')) AS CONTENTS ,' ' AS URL ,'1' AS MSG_GUBUN ,'1' AS DEST_GUBUN ,'' AS CC_RECV_IDS ,'' AS BCC_RECV_IDS ,'0' AS RSRV_FLAG ,NOW() AS RSRV_DATE ,'0' AS ATT_FLAG ,'' AS ATT ,RQST ,BIZ_DCD FROM ( -- 결재자 지정 SELECT A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_NM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,RU.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,P.USER_ID AS APRV_USER_ID ,AU.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM ,P.APR_LVL ,A.RQST_NO AS RQST ,A.BIZ_DCD FROM WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_APR_PRC P ON A.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO INNER JOIN WAA_USER AU ON P.USER_ID = AU.USER_ID AND AU.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND AU.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAA_USER RU ON A.RQST_USER_ID = RU.USER_ID AND RU.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND RU.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.APR_FRML_CD IN ('D','T','J','A') AND A.RQST_USER_ID != P.USER_ID AND APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_APR_PRC Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO AND Z.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ) UNION ALL -- 그룹결재 SELECT A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_NM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,RU.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,G.USER_ID AS APRV_USER_ID ,AU.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM ,P.APR_LVL ,A.RQST_NO AS RQST ,A.BIZ_DCD FROM WAQ_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_APR_PRC P ON A.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO INNER JOIN WAA_APRG_USER G ON G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND P.USER_ID = G.APRG_ID INNER JOIN WAA_USER AU ON G.USER_ID = AU.USER_ID AND AU.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND AU.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAA_USER RU ON A.RQST_USER_ID = RU.USER_ID AND RU.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND RU.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.APR_FRML_CD = 'G' AND A.RQST_USER_ID != G.USER_ID AND APR_LVL = (SELECT MIN(APR_LVL) FROM WAA_APR_PRC Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO AND APRV_DTM IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_APR_PRC Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = P.RQST_NO AND Z.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ) )
